name: Sftp
description: This Test Connection validates access to an SFTP server and the ability to list files and directories.

steps.name: CheckAccess
steps.description: Validate that we can connect to the SFTP server and authenticate using the provided credentials.
steps.errorMessage: Failed to connect to SFTP server. Please verify the host, port, and credentials.

steps.name: ListDirectories
steps.description: List directories accessible to the authenticated user on the SFTP server.
steps.errorMessage: Failed to list directories on SFTP server. Please ensure the user has the necessary permissions to access the specified directories.
